Honda Topknot (Samurai, Men)
kDesc
"Honda-mage" topknot worn by samurai which was folded one-third back and two-thirds forward and tied somewhat high on the head.\nDefensive Strength:★[#Legal]
Coiffure de guerrier, enroulée assez haut sur le crâne, un tiers en arrière, deux tiers en avant.\nDéfense:★[#Legal]
Ein "Hondamage"-Haarknoten, getragen von Samurai, der an einer Stelle ein Drittel vom Haaransatz hinten und zwei Drittel vom Haaransatz vorne, etwas erhöht umgelegt wird.\nVerteidigung:★[#Legal]
Acconciatura per samurai, con i capelli raccolti all'insù. I capelli sono raccolti per un terzo indietro e due terzi in avanti.\nDifesa:★ [#Legal]
El cabello esta enrollado un tercio en la parte de atrás y dos tercios en la parte de adelante. Peluca tradicional japonesa con el pelo recogido un poco alto de estilo samurái.\nDefensa:★ [#Legal]
後方三分、前方七分ほどで折り返し、やや高めで結った武士スタイルの本多髷。\n防御力 ：★[#Legal]
상투를 정수리 뒤쪽에서 말아올려 약간 높게 묶은 무사 스타일의 혼다마게.\n방어력: ★[#Legal]
"Honda-mage" topknot worn by samurai which was folded one-third back and two-thirds forward and tied somewhat high on the head.\nDefensive Strength:★[#Legal]
武士風格的本多髮髻，後方三分，前方七分折回，於稍高的位置紥起。\n防禦力：★[#Legal]
武士風格的本多髮髻，後方三分，前方七分折回，於稍高的位置紥起。\n防禦力：★[#Legal]
